nodes.name: importIssuerData

arguments.value: Only the FeePool contract can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the FeePool contract can perform this action"

appendAccountIssuanceRecord(address,uint.details: onlyFeePool to call me on synthetix.issue() & synthetix.burn() calls to store the locked SNX per fee period so we know to allocate the correct proportions of fees and rewards per period accountIssuanceLedger[account][0] has the latest locked amount for the current period. This can be update as many time accountIssuanceLedger[account][1-2] has the last locked amount for a previous period they minted or burned

params.currentPeriodStartDebtIndex: The startingDebtIndex of the current fee period
params.debtEntryIndex: The index in the global debt ledger. synthetix.synthetixState().issuanceData(account)
params.debtRatio: Debt of this account as a percentage of the global debt.

params.closingDebtIndex: the last periods debt index on close

params.index: Index in the array to retrieve. Upto FEE_PERIOD_LENGTH

importIssuerData(address[],uint256[],uin.details: Only callable by the contract owner, and only for 6 weeks after deployment.

params.feePeriodCloseIndex: An accounts debtEntryIndex is valid when within the fee peroid, since the input ratio will be an average of the pervious periods it just needs to be > recentFeePeriods[periodToInsert].startingDebtIndex < recentFeePeriods[periodToInsert - 1].startingDebtIndex
params.periodToInsert: The Fee Period to insert the historical records into

initiateSelfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

selfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

setFeePool(address).details: Must be set by owner when FeePool logic is upgraded

setSelfDestructBeneficiary(address).details: Only the contract owner may call this. The provided beneficiary must be non-null.

params._beneficiary: The address to pay any eth contained in this contract to upon self-destruction.

terminateSelfDestruct().details: Only the contract owner may call this.

appendAccountIssuanceRecord(address,uint.notice: Logs an accounts issuance data in the current fee period which is then stored historically

applicableIssuanceData(address,uint256).notice: Find the oldest debtEntryIndex for the corresponding closingDebtIndex

importIssuerData(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Import issuer data from synthetixState.issuerData on FeePeriodClose() block #

initiateSelfDestruct().notice: Begin the self-destruction counter of this contract. Once the delay has elapsed, the contract may be self-destructed.

selfDestruct().notice: If the self-destruction delay has elapsed, destroy this contract and remit any ether it owns to the beneficiary address.

setFeePool(address).notice: set the FeePool contract as it is the only authority to be able to call appendAccountIssuanceRecord with the onlyFeePool modifer

setSelfDestructBeneficiary(address).notice: Set the beneficiary address of this contract.

terminateSelfDestruct().notice: Terminate and reset the self-destruction timer.
